name: enter_lottery
attributes: # [doc = " 特定の NFT ミントの保有量に応じて当選確率を決定し、"]
# [doc = " 抽選を実行して結果を記録します。"]
# [doc = " - `base_bps`: 1 枚あたりの当選確率（basis points, 10000 = 100%）"]
body: let rand_bps = (clock . unix_timestamp as u64 % 10_000) as u16 ;
let hold = ctx . accounts . user_nft_account . amount ;
let mut chance = hold . checked_mul (base_bps as u64) . unwrap () . min (10_000) as u16 ;
let result = & mut ctx . accounts . result ;
result . user = * ctx . accounts . user . key ;
emit ! (LotteryEvent { user : * ctx . accounts . user . key , hold : hold , chance_bps : chance , random_bps : rand_bps , won : win , }) ;

fields.name: user
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 抽選に参加するユーザー（署名必須）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: user_nft_account
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 指定の NFT ミントを保有する TokenAccount"] # [account (constraint = user_nft_account . owner == * user . key , constraint = user_nft_account . mint == nft_mint . key () ,)]

fields.name: nft_mint
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 対象 NFT の Mint アドレス"]

fields.name: result
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 結果を保存するアカウント（PDA）"] # [account (init_if_needed , payer = user , space = 8 + 32 + 8 + 2 + 2 + 1 , seeds = [b"lottery" , user . key () . as_ref ()] , bump ,)]
